title: PedANP
cleaned_text: we're the pediatric association of naturopathic physicians Our Mission The Pediatric Association of Naturopathic Physicians expands and disseminates knowledge about best practices in naturopathic medical care for the pediatric population. Our goal is to elevate the standard of pediatric care and education in our naturopathic medical programs as well as in the profession as a whole. We encourage and facilitate expansion of dialogue on important pediatric issues within the medical community. our vision The Pediatric Association of Naturopathic Physicians will shape and influence the policies and educational programs of naturopathic medicine that directly affect our approach to children's healthcare. We will pursue resources in order to expand pediatric residency development as well as opportunities that will increase and strengthen the presence of naturopathic medicine in primary pediatric care.
